co.cask.cdap.etl.api.batch

Interface BatchSinkContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BatchContext, DatasetContext, LookupProvider, StageContext, TransformContext

    @Beta
public interface BatchSinkContext
extends BatchContext
    Context of a Batch Sink.

    • Method Detail

      • addOutput

        @Deprecated
void addOutput(String datasetName)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use addOutput(Output) instead
        Overrides the output configuration of this job to also allow writing to the specified dataset by its name.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the output dataset

      • addOutput

        @Deprecated
void addOutput(String datasetName,
                        Map<String,String> arguments)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use addOutput(Output) instead
        Updates the output configuration of this job to also allow writing to the specified dataset. Currently, the dataset specified in must be an OutputFormatProvider. You may want to use this method instead of addOutput(String) if your output dataset uses runtime arguments set in your own program logic.
        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the output dataset
        arguments - the arguments to use when instantiating the dataset
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified dataset is not an OutputFormatProvider.

      • addOutput

        @Deprecated
void addOutput(String outputName,
                        OutputFormatProvider outputFormatProvider)
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 3.4.0. Use addOutput(Output) instead
        Updates the output configuration of this job to also allow writing using the given OutputFormatProvider.
        Parameters:
        outputName - the name of the output
        outputFormatProvider - the outputFormatProvider which specifies an OutputFormat and configuration to be used when writing to this output

      • addOutput

        void addOutput(Output output)
        Updates the output configuration of this job to also allow writing using the given output.
        Parameters:
        output - output to be used
